abstract: NBA Roundup; Houston Rockets beat Miami Heat, 115-102; other pro basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: James Harden scored 26 points to help the Houston Rockets end a three-game losing streak with a 115-102 win over the Miami Heat.

headline.print_headline: Rockets Win After Howard Is Suspended
headline.main: Rockets Win After Dwight Howard Is Suspended
